alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 10:07PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Buffalo County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1007 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kearney, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kearney around 1015 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Gibbon. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 269 and 272. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Nebraska.
